name: go-goban-go-optimization
description: Advanced client-side optimization build system for Go Goban Go game

scripts.build:legacy: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:concat && npm run build:css:minify
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:concat && npm run build:js:minify
scripts.build:js:minify: uglifyjs backend/static/dist/app.bundle.js -o backend/static/dist/app.min.js -c drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true -m toplevel=true --comments false
scripts.watch:legacy: npm run build:legacy && chokidar 'backend/static/css/**/*.css' 'backend/static/js/**/*.optimized.js' -c 'npm run build:legacy'
scripts.postinstall: echo '✅ Build system ready! Run npm run build for production or npm run dev for development'
scripts.analyze: npm run build && du -sh backend/static/dist/* && echo 'Build analysis complete'
scripts.test:build: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Testing minified assets...'); require('fs').readdirSync('backend/static/dist').forEach(f => console.log('✓', f));"

author: Dane & Claude
